title: Comparative Design of COPLS One-on-One Model and Traditional Lecture-Based Approaches for Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and basic familiarity with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment integrating VR simulations and online communication tools in a BYOD context.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the differences between the COPLS one-on-one model and traditional lecture-based approaches through scientific case analysis.
Learners can independently collect and interpret experimental data in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can write comparative evaluation reports on peer feedback and instructor support under two pedagogical approaches.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
